answers.answer: Hello,A complete evaluation is very necessary for accurate diagnosis and treatment. Right sided pain in the chest can be due to non-serious and serious causes both. Chest pain with cough indicates a respiratory tract infection. Burning pain with belching can be due to GERD.Dull aching pain which becomes severe on pressing the ribs is called costochondritis.Persistent dull pain which worsens on breathing can be due to pleurisy. Any chest pain should be taken seriously. If there is associated jaw pain, pain in left hand, sweating then it can be a symptom of a heart attack. In that case emergency medical care is very important. You will need complete evaluation along with investigations like ECG, echocardiography. Any nerve damage or injury can cause numbness. A disc lesion in the lower back may compress the spinal nerves causing numbness. Stroke, multiple sclerosis all can lead to numbness. Vitamin B12 deficiency can lead to numbness throughout the body. Diabetes mellitus can cause tingling, numbness. It is best to get evaluated by a neurologist.Take care and regards!

question: I HAVE  raight side chest pain ,and back i have cough and left foot numb  im 33 years old
title: help me
